name: Computer Tycoon (itch) (Sssnize Studio)
description:
This is a 2d game made by Sssnize Studio and DeltaStudios.

Brand new game for all you Tycoon and Pixel lovers! Computer Tycoon is a exciting and challenging game, currently there is the open BETA allowing you to only play the "Challenge Mode". Challenge mode is a mode where you have 5 minutes to complete a few challenges. We are looking forward to making events where the quickest players that complete challenge mode as fast as they can will get a prize. I hope you have fun winning some luxuries and expensive prices!
